name: Trapped In Stone - World War II Horror
name_original: Trapped In Stone - World War II Horror
description:
Trapped In Stone is a cinematic linear World War 2 Horror Game where you play as A German Officer who gets trapped inside a bunker by American troops. Explore the bunker, find a way out and fight for your life.

Gameplay

Trapped In Stone offers a unique non-repetitive gameplay. It takes inspirations from various genres.
-Explore the claustrophobic bunker (which is based on real location).
-Fight off human and non-human enemies
-Get immersed in the story with the help of high quality cinematics.
-Beat various mini-games in order to progress through the story.

Story.

You play as Officer Manfred - A German WW2 Officer trapped inside a bunker. Looking for a way out, you soon discover an American war weapon that threatens to kill all of the human population.
